headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 3X GTA$ & RP in Till Death Do Us Part
content: Till Death Do Us Part is a recipe for the ultimate GTA Online quadruple date. Four couples each have just one life between the two of them â€“ if your partner dies, you die. Remember: codependence is dramatic and romantic. Cuddling up is its own reward here, too: players regenerate health by staying close to one another. Get comfortable and destroy any couple that comes too close.
